name: Herbarius
description:
Herbarius is a simulation game in which you'll take the role of a herbalist who heals people using various plants.

Choose the seeds in the shop wisely to anticipate the customers' needs and try to complete the encyclopedia!

But be careful, some plants can kill. Guess which ones using their Latin name: for example, the first flower in the game, "Inpulsa reparator", means "Shock repairer". So give it to someone who have a bruise!

The first version of this game was created  by The_blue_stone and Kamisamiaw during "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022" with the theme "Heal", and is our first game! We're very proud of it and we hope you'll like it.

If you notice a bug, a translation error or another problem, please report it by posting a comment below!

And most importantly...

Have fun playing Herbarius! :)
